channel.title: CVE Feed for Solidigm -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Solidigm -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47975|2024-10-11T19:23:58.942Z -- solidigm -- d7-p5500
item.description: Improper access control validation in firmware of some Solidigm DC Products may allow an attacker with physical access to gain unauthorized access or an attacker with local access to potentially enable denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-47974|2024-10-08T14:08:06.360Z -- solidigm -- d7-p5510
item.description: Race condition during resource shutdown in some Solidigm DC Products may allow an attacker to potentially enable denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-47969|2024-10-08T14:11:28.611Z -- solidigm -- dc%20p4510
item.description: Improper resource management in firmware of some Solidigm DC Products may allow an attacker to potentially enable denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-47967|2024-10-08T14:20:49.935Z -- solidigm -- d7-p5510
item.description: Improper resource initialization handling in firmware of some Solidigm DC Products may allow an attacker to potentially enable denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-47973|2024-10-08T14:09:51.705Z -- solidigm -- d7-p5520
item.description: In some Solidigm DC Products, a defect in device overprovisioning may provide information disclosure to an attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-47968|2024-10-07T21:19:38.965Z -- solidigm -- dc%20p4510
item.description: Improper resource shutdown in middle of certain operations on some Solidigm DC Products may allow an attacker to potentially enable denial of service.

item.description: Improper resource initialization handling in firmware of some Solidigm DC Products may allow an attacker to potentially enable denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-47971|2024-10-07T19:40:24.635Z -- solidigm -- d5-p5316
item.description: Improper error handling in firmware of some SSD DC Products may allow an attacker to enable denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-47976|2024-10-07T19:15:13.415Z -- solidigm -- dc%20p4510
item.description: Improper access removal handling in firmware of some Solidigm DC Products may allow an attacker with physical access to gain unauthorized access.

item.title: CVE-2024-47972|2024-10-07T19:40:00.550Z -- solidigm -- d7-p5510
item.description: Improper resource management in firmware of some Solidigm DC Products may allow an attacker to potentially control the performance of the resource.
